QuestData.Title: I'll Only Say This Once
QuestData.Description:
At last, we are fully prepared to enact the baroness's plan.
Now that you have arrived, I will recount our roles one final time. Then we will seize our fate.
Listen closely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Whisperer Vyn about the plan.
QuestData.RewardText: Let us put our plan into motion.

Objectives.Objective: Review the plan with Whisperer Vyn
